title: Trading
content:
Trading is a feature in Brighter Shores that allows player characters to trade items with other player characters.

It will not be available upon the game release, but instead be released through an update at a later date.

It will only available to players who have purchased the Premium Pass.

Once released, it will be unlocked upon reaching Crenopolis.


 * Player to player trading was originally planned to release with the early access, however this was later changed to "Coming soon".
